title: Part One: Basil Zaharoff: The Man Who Sold World War One
itunes:title: Part One: Basil Zaharoff: The Man Who Sold World War One
description:
Robert is joined by Teresa Lee to discuss Basil Zaharoff, The First Great Arms Dealer.


FOOTNOTES:

  1. Man of Arms: The Life and Legend of Sir Basil Zaharoff
  2. Men Of Wealth: The Story Of Twelve Significant Fortunes From The Renaissance To The Present Day 
  3. Arms Race prior to 1914, Armament Policy
  4. A scandal of international proportions comes out of the vaults
  5. The Mysterious Mr. Zedzed: The Wickedest Man in the World
  6. The Soviets and Tsarist Debt
  7. ZACHARIA BASILIUS ZACHAROFF

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
